content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's negotiate the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am aware that you are asking for 650 Euros per month. However, I would like to propose 600 Euros per month instead. I believe that this price is more reasonable given the current market situation.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am not willing to accept 600 Euros per month for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given that you have rejected my offer, I would like to propose 640 euros per month. This is a fair price considering the location and the facilities provided by the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am not willing to accept 640 Euros per month for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understanding your position, I would like to propose 630 euros per month. This is a good price for both parties, as it is a fair compromise between our previous offers.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am not willing to accept 630 Euros per month for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Last offer: 620 euros per month. This is the lowest I can go for this apartment. I believe this is a fair price considering the location and the facilities provided by the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am not willing to accept 620 Euros per month for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Final offer: 610 euros per month. This is the lowest I can go for this apartment. I believe this is a fair price considering the location and the facilities provided by the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [610] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
